item.title: Unchange spotlight image in windows lock screen
item.description: Symptom The Spotlight image unchange in Windows 10 lock screen Solution Reset Windows Spotlight feature on Windows 10 Step 1 Disabling Spotlight feature To disable Windows Spotlight on Windows 10 by: Open Settings Click on Personalization Click on Lock screen Use the Background drop-down menu, and select the Picture or Slideshow option. Step 2 Resetting Spotlight settings To Reset the spotlight feature with PowerShell commands by:
